rule_set_2.rules:
rule: [  ] ---> b / [ -nasal ] [ -coronal -high ] _
rule: [  ] ---> m / [  ] [ +low ] _
rule: [ +voice -continuant ] ---> a / [ -sonorant ] _

rule_set_4.rules:
rule: [  ] ---> -2 / [ -back -coronal ] [  ] _
rule: [  ] ---> m / [  ] [ +low ] _
rule: [ +voice -sonorant ] ---> p / {#,[ -nasal ]} _
rule: [  ] ---> a / [ +coronal -sonorant ] _ {#,[ -voice ]}
